Results

Wow...this is crazy to say but I feel so fortunate, blessed and forever grateful that I’ve had the opportunity to have Shawn in my life. (It’s only crazy to say because when I started coaching I was very skeptical at what could really happen). What started out as Real Estate Coaching has turned into something far greater than I could’ve ever imagined. Shawn is seriously one of the best guys I have ever had the opportunity to learn from. If you are in or thinking about getting into Real Estate and have the opportunity to work with, for, or be coached by this man do it!!!

The amount of value I have received from 30 minute phone calls with Shawn is invaluable and has forever changed the trajectory of my life. If it wasn’t for the fact that I am all the way up in Wisconsin I would be working with Shawn down in Jacksonville and I wouldn’t hesitate to close my Business down and work with him if that was the case. My personal experiences with Shawn were great as it related to Real Estate and making sure I’m doing the right things in the right order but it was more his heart and the conversations we had about thinking bigger and reaching for more in all areas of my life. He just provided and gave more than I can ever repay him for and I will forever be grateful for the time he spent with me and still does to this day! More than anything I’m grateful to call him my Friend!

Shawn is going to make a positive impact on your life, just be open to seeing things a different way and expanding you vision for what is possible for you. There is no better person, in my mind, to be associated with than Shawn. With that said if you’re looking for more in all areas of your life, more than just another real estate deal, more than just getting by, more than just being ok with the status quo, take the time to meet with this Man. Even if you don’t work with him he will give you more value than you could ever imagine.

Shawn my brother!!! I have gone through so many different programs for coaching and talking with hundreds of people, and out of them all you’re truly the only one I call a friend, I appreciate you and am here for you. I know you’re going to make a positive impact on the lives of anyone who comes into your circle/sphere. Keep up the good work and God bless.

- TJ Vitense

Shawn is a dynamic and strategic leader who is dedicated in getting the best out of those around him! His systems, ideology and culture create an environment that you can prosper with... Quite simply Shawn is the real deal!

- Gil Ramos

Dan is a consummate professional with a calm, cool and collected nature. He has easily handled all managing broker issues I have brought to him with professionalism and patience. I would highly recommend Dan Stephenson!!

Dan is a great real estate broker. He has some great ideas and is very helpful with implementing sales plans. He follows through when he says he is going to do something, so many in this business do not. I am proud to work with him!

- Jim Steele | Realtor at RE/MAX Champions

Dan Stephenson is a assertive sales leader that has been able to motivate his sales team to reach greater wealth for themselves and the company. Dan has great work ethic, a great sense of humor, and has the initiative to challenge himself and his team to drive for greater than expected results. He has a great judge of hiring quality teams and is very much in his element managing them on a daily basis. His Team admires his mentoring abilities and immediate response to their daily needs. He was promoted as Area Director to manage the Naples office, as well. I would highly recommend Dan in a senior sales, management, and leadership role managing large teams in any sales environment. Having worked in the hospitality and restaurant business for 38 years, I would highly recommend Dan for a management position in this field, as well. Do not hesitate to call me directly for a personal reference. J.Beard 1/2/14

- Jim Beard | Hospitality Hotels & F & B Consultant, Cobra Enthusiast

I have thoroughly enjoyed working with Dan. He is extremely personable one-on-one as a coach and mentor to his staff. He is a great leader who instills confidence in employees, provides a clear company vision, and fosters a positive, enthusiastic culture. I would highly recommend Dan to any organization that is looking for an experience and dynamic leader who can motivate employees as well as increase sales.

- Andrea Cooley | Senior Technical Writer & Business Process Analyst at Self-Employed

I have had to rewrite this recommendation twice due to the character limitation within Linkedin, however I feel strongly that for those that read this fully understand what kind of leader and individual Dan Stephenson is for our company. I have been in a field for most of my career that requires an entrepreneurial spirit and drive from every level of the organization and Dan's ability motivate and foster that spirit is second to none. It is uncanny that Dan can energize a 40 year veteran and a 3 week old recruit just from his enthusiasm and constant effort to understand his audience. Dan's role within our organization rapidly grew as his personalization of technology training and positive influence was measurable in sales and market share. Dan supports out team of sales executives that used to resist technology as the perception was that it would replace personal interaction. In my time as a business owner and CFO I have not witnessed someone that could so quickly remove the apprehension of technology and prove that it does not create relationships…it enhances them. Dan is a thought leader that loves to work and his enthusiasm really is contagious. I would recommend Dan, in an instant, for any executive sales leader position that requires passion to succeed, intimate understanding of sales statistics and trends and a personal interest in all of those that he leads.

- Alex Cramer | Chief Financial Officer at Capstone Tropical Holdings, Inc/Berkshire Hathaway Home Services/Florida Properties Group

About Expert Home Advisors


Expert Home Advisors is a passionate team of Real Estate professionals servicing the Jacksonville Florida area. Dedicated to their clients, this group of market savvy home experts focuses their attention to each customers needs and wants. And unlike most agencies, Expert Home Advisors has a Client Services Manager and Transaction Manager on staff who additionally ensure that the least amount stress impacts each and every client.
